name: Open_New_Account
description: Request to open a new personal or business bank account with BigBankCorp, including checking, savings, or investment accounts.

name: Loan_Application
description: Request for a personal or commercial loan, including mortgages, credit cards, and lines of credit, with BigBankCorp.

name: Investment_Portfolio_Rebalancing
description: Request to rebalance an investment portfolio managed by BigBankCorp's wealth management team, including adjusting asset allocations and trading securities.

name: Wire_Transfer_Request
description: Request to initiate a domestic or international wire transfer from a BigBankCorp account, including specifying transfer amount and recipient information.

name: Credit_Card_Limit_Increase
description: Request to increase the credit limit on a BigBankCorp-issued credit card, including providing income and credit history information.

name: Account_Linkage_Request
description: Request to link multiple BigBankCorp accounts, including personal and business accounts, for consolidated online banking access.

name: Stop_Payment_Request
description: Request to stop payment on a check or electronic transaction processed by BigBankCorp, including specifying transaction details and reason for stop payment.

name: Account_Update_Notification
description: Request to update personal or business account information with BigBankCorp, including changes to address, phone number, or email.

name: Transaction_Dispute_Filing
description: Request to dispute a transaction on a BigBankCorp account, including providing transaction details and reason for dispute.

name: Account_Closure_Request
description: Request to close a BigBankCorp account, including specifying account details and reason for closure.
